content:
@jenlampton - Did you mention a few days ago that you couldn't find a scheduled tweet?

I just reinstalled the Twitter app on my laptop and no longer seem to be able to see or schedule Tweets through the app. I can still do it through the website. I wonder if they removed that feature from the app?

I was thinking it was just me, but then remembered your comment.
Yeah, I think you have to get to scheduled tweets via the ads dashboard now
